byline.contributor: An earlier version of this article misidentified the studio in which Alexander Calder is shown in some of the best-known photographs of him. It was not the studio on his property that was fashioned from an old icehouse.

abstract: Exhibition at Pace Gallery brings together seminal works produced in 1941 by sculptor Alexander Calder, many of which have not been on public view since their original showing.
snippet: The year 1941 was singular for Alexander Calder. Now a show at the Pace Gallery brings together his sculpture of that time, which signified a turning point in his career.
lead_paragraph: The year 1941 was singular for Alexander Calder. Now a show at the Pace Gallery brings together his sculpture of that time, which signified a turning point in his career.

headline.main: A Year in the Work of Calder
headline.print_headline: A Year in the Work of Calder
headline.seo: Alexander Calder in 1941, at the Pace Gallery
